metadata.title: CVE-2024-44987 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ipv6: prevent UAF in ip6_send_skb()syzbot reported an UAF in ip6_send_skb() [1]After ip6_local_out() has returned, we no longer can safelydereference rt, unless we hold rcu_read_lock().A similar issue has been fixed in commita688caa34beb ("ipv6: take rcu lock in rawv6_send_hdrinc()")Another potential issue in ip6_finish_output2()
